Where did I get my assets from? - links
===============================


Audio
=====
background music  - ?
bite_friendly     - https://www.freesound.org/people/orginaljun/sounds/152313/
bite_scary        - https://www.freesound.org/people/ggctuk/sounds/80551/
levelup           - https://www.freesound.org/people/LittleRobotSoundFactory/sounds/270404/
tweet             - https://www.freesound.org/people/Andreas.Mustola/sounds/338277/
fart              - https://www.freesound.org/people/bernd666/sounds/113760/
splat             - https://www.freesound.org/people/LittleRobotSoundFactory/sounds/316535/
cleanUp           - https://www.freesound.org/people/Jim%20Goad/sounds/272477/
shooting-star     - http://www.freesound.org/people/plasterbrain/sounds/351810/
invincible        - http://www.freesound.org/people/SgtPepperArc360/sounds/338866/

Sprites
=======
poo.png           - <a href="https://icons8.com">Icons8</a>
cloud.png         - <a href="https://icons8.com">Icons8</a>
all bird sprites  - http://opengameart.org/users/bevouliincom
meat.png          - http://opengameart.org/content/shadowless-lpc-food
papercuts-2.ttf   - http://www.dafont.com/paper_cuts.font
background.png    - http://opengameart.org/content/sky-backdrop
sparkles          - http://opengameart.org/content/sparkles
splatters         - https://pixabay.com/en/splatter-blue-paint-ink-abstract-303249/
                  - https://pixabay.com/en/splatter-paint-colors-arts-blue-296489/
                  - https://pixabay.com/en/splat-purple-paint-arts-grunge-303394/
                  - https://pixabay.com/en/ink-black-splatter-abstract-paint-303240/
Star              - http://opengameart.org/content/star
Eveything else    - Kenney.nl
